system.requirements:
Tier 3; Tech-Use +20, Mechanicus Implants
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect:
Gain +10 to all Tech-Use Skill Tests. The Character can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on a Tech-Use Skill Test for enhancement, repair, or upgrade of a machine's systems, taking the minimum amount of time possible for the task.
At GM discretion, the character can repair objects without all parts to hand by jury-rigging a working device as good as the original.
